titles.title: A resolution to remove "Select" from the title of the Select Committee on Indian Affairs and to designate room 485 in the Richard Brevard Russell Senate Office Building as the "Room of the First Americans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1498)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Redesignates: (1) the Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs as the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs; and (2) room 485 in the Richard Brevard Russell Senate Office Building as the Room of the First Americans.
